title: Wanda Realm Dongying Invites You to Experience The Prosperity and Grandeur of the Ancient Qi DynastyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Wanda Realm Dongying Invites You to Experience The Prosperity and Grandeur of the Ancient Qi Dynasty Published on : Monday, August 17, 2015
Wanda Realm Dongying, the 76th hotel owned and managed by Wanda Hotels & Resorts, celebrated its grand opening on 15th August, 2015, marking the 29th Wanda Realm hotel to open in China and the 40th hotel property to be wholly owned and managed by Wanda Hotels & Resorts.
Following the theme “The Prosperous Realm of the Ancient Qi Dynasty”, the opening ceremony turned out to be a magnificent affair and was attended by 150 VIP guests and media.
Wanda Realm Dongying is located at Wanda Plaza, the commercial center and heart of Dongying city, which serves as an ideal base for both business and leisure guests. It can be reached within five minutes’ drive from the main bus station, a 35-minute drive from the airport, or a 25-minute drive from the railway station.
The hotel features 285 guestrooms and suites, all comfortably appointed but with a chic artistic flair. Each room features the luxurious signature “Bed of Realm” and “Dream Catcher” services, which include calming fragrances, music and bedtime reading materials to help ease guests into a good night’s sleep. Guests can also enjoy the warm Asian hospitality of Wanda Realm with its signature oriental touches, such as a bedside copy of the “Book of Liki”. All guest bathrooms feature a rainfall shower, standing bathtub and luxury toiletries.
The hotel will also house several new restaurants serving a range of cuisines for an outstanding fine dining experience. ZHEN Chinese restaurant will serve up masterful Cantonese and local Shandong dishes, “Chili & Pepper” specializes in fresh ingredients and spicy flavours sure to heat up the palette, while for all-day dining, guests may order from the international menu or help themselves to a tantalizing buffet spread at Café Realm. Guests can also choose to relax with light refreshments in a comfortable setting at The Lobby Lounge, or enjoy a meal anytime in the privacy and comfort of their own room through the “24-hrs Selections” room service menu.
The hotel boasts a spectacular 1,200 square meter pillar-less ballroom with majestic nine-meter ceiling height, which comes equipped with an 80 square meter LED screen and state-of-the-art professional audio system. For more intimate gatherings, choose from the six private function rooms, ranging from 54 to 208 square meters and each equipped with advanced audio and visual equipment as well as complimentary high-speed Internet. For your convenience and ease of mind, the hotel also offers an “Exclusive Meeting Director” one-stop service to help ensure your events run smoothly.
Guests also have access to the hotel’s world-class health and leisure facilities, including a temperature-controlled indoor swimming pool, fully-equipped gym, whirlpool hot tub and steam room for rejuvenation.
“Dongying city enjoys a strategic geographic location at the intersection of the Bohai Sea and Yellow River economic belt, making it a key area of growth for investment and development. Setting the benchmark as the city’s premium five-star hotel, Wanda Realm Dongying is the ideal choice for leisure and business travelers and has all the makings of a new local landmark,” says Mr Peter Wang, manager of Wanda Realm Dongying.
Source:-Wanda Hotels & Resorts
